channel.title: [erasedpkz]Jarred client(it works) just want background black instead of white
channel.description:
K so what i mean is, when you maximize it, it has a white background. like this: http://prntscr.com/5cp0n
i want it to be centered, and also with a black background, just like this..: http://prntscr.com/5cp3a
Is this even possible? I'd really like to know :P

item.title: [erasedpkz]Jarred client(it works) just want background black instead of white

item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

No…I want to make the background of the jarred client BLACK when you resize it…Like runescape. Black instead of white.

Read full topic

[quote=“iBunnie, post:3, topic:429410”]But this isnt a webclient it’s a jarred client? I’m still confused.[/quote]the image you showed me looked like a webclient. If the client is going over too far then you need to go into the client and change the size of the client.
